title.rendered: Grow Your Agency’s Sales ROI: Create a ‘Fast-Fail’ Sales Process

content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1586442245374{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-top: 180px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}” el_class=”overflow gradient-lt-dk-gray-with-ss-while-logo”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1583411856909{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”left-col-mob”][vc_column_text el_class=”m-b-0″ css=”.vc_custom_1597083515468{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”]

Grow Your Agency’s Sales ROI: Create a ‘Fast-Fail’ Sales Process

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1598554710007{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”]

On-Demand Webinar Presented by Karl Sakas

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1588878863914{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”][easy-social-share buttons=”twitter,linkedin,facebook,mail” counters=0 style=”icon” template=”37″ size=”xs” point_type=”simple”][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ el_id=”passedEvent-column” el_class=”hidden”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1525275406838{padding-top: 2% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1583364273895{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron” el_id=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]Want to scale your digital agency? You’ll need to grow your sales ROI… and that requires being strategic about which prospects get a proposal.

Smart agencies create a “fast-fail” sales process to focus on high-value opportunities by quickly eliminating tire-kickers.

Ready to boost your sales ROI? Check out this on-demand webinar from renowned agency consultant and coach Karl Sakas. You’ll get actionable tips on:

  • What to ask before agreeing to an exploratory call to avoid wasting your time
  • How to run a strategy-first sales call to help you justify charging premium pricing
  • How to get “paid to create a proposal” to make your sales process more profitable

You can start using the agency-tested tips immediately. Consider sending to your entire team—the content applies to agency owners, directors, salespeople, account managers, and project managers.[/vc_column_text]

Karl Sakas

Agency Consultant
Sakas & Company

Agency growth is good… until it gets out of control. Karl Sakas helps agency leaders “calm the chaos” of running their business—through consulting, coaching, and training. Clients benefit from Karl’s agency operations background and experience in digital marketing since the days of dialup. His clients call him their “agency therapist.” When he’s not advising agencies worldwide, Karl volunteers as a bartender on an antique train.read more...

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”]
A little about SharpSpring:
[vc_column_text]If you’re not familiar with SharpSpring, we’re a comprehensive sales and marketing platform, similar to HubSpot and Marketo…except we’re different because we’re the only company built specifically for agencies.[/vc_column_text][vc_video link=”https://vimeo.com/360856486″ align=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1583360124979{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}”]
Trusted by more than 2,000 agencies

[vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”209119″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1625777412448{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1587065419738{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent hide-cta” el_id=”register”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”stop”][vc_column][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”sticky-mobile-button”][vc_column]
